remarks: Two functionals with the same kernel are the same up to a constant. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2015.)
statement:
eqlkr4.s $e |- S = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
eqlkr4.r $e |- R = ( Base ` S ) $.
eqlkr4.f $e |- F = ( LFnl ` W ) $.
eqlkr4.k $e |- K = ( LKer ` W ) $.
eqlkr4.d $e |- D = ( LDual ` W ) $.
eqlkr4.t $e |- .x. = ( .s ` D ) $.
eqlkr4.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. LVec ) $.
eqlkr4.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. F ) $.
eqlkr4.h $e |- ( ph -> H e. F ) $.
eqlkr4.e $e |- ( ph -> ( K ` G ) = ( K ` H ) ) $.
eqlkr4 $p |- ( ph -> E. r e. R H = ( r .x. G ) ) $.
$d F r $.
$d G r $.
$d H r $.
$d K r $.
$d R r $.
$d S r $.
$d W r $.
$d ph r $.
